items.title: The spectacle of Bryan Johnson and his livestreamed shrooms trip
items.description: Bryan Johnson livestreamed his shrooms trip -- which included both Grimes and Marc Benioff -- as part of his controversial longevity research.

items.title: AWS launches new Nova AI models and a service that gives customers more control
